original_text: And when the governor had read the letter, he asked of what province he was. And when he understood that he was of Cilicia;
korean_text: 총독이 읽고 바울더러 어느 영지 사람이냐 물어 길리기아 사람인 줄 알고

sentences.original_text: And when the governor had read the letter,
he asked of what province he was.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그가 어떤 지방 사람인지 물었다.
